USE gold_db
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROC CreateSQLServerlessView_gold @ViewName NVARCHAR(100)
AS
BEGIN

DECLARE @statement VARCHAR(MAX)

    SET @statement = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW ' + @ViewName +  ' AS
        SELECT * 
        FROM
            OPENRAWSET(
                BULK ''https://realtimedatalakegen2.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/SalesLT/' + @ViewName + '/'',
                FORMAT = ''DELTA''
            ) as [result]
    '

EXEC (@statement)

END
GO
